manus.name: Alex Gorsky
manus.verification: Alex Gorsky is a verified member of Apple Inc.'s Board of Directors. He was elected to the board in November 2021. He is the former Chairman and CEO of Johnson & Johnson (stepped down as CEO in 2022 and Executive Chair in 2023). He currently serves as an independent director for Apple and also sits on the boards of JPMorgan Chase and IBM.

manus.name: Monica Lozano
manus.verification: Monica Lozano was verified as an active member of the Apple Inc. Board of Directors. She was appointed in January 2021 and was most recently re-elected at the 2024 Annual Meeting of Shareholders. manus.name: Ronald D. Sugar, Ph.D.
manus.verification: Ronald D. Sugar, Ph.D. is verified as an active member of the Board of Directors at Apple Inc. He has served on the board since 2010 and currently chairs the Audit and Finance Committee. Despite Apple's retirement policy for directors over 75, the board specifically requested he stand for re-election in 2025 to provide stability during the CFO transition. His background as the former Chairman and CEO of Northrop Grumman is also confirmed.

manus.name: Susan L. Wagner
manus.verification: Susan L. Wagner is a verified member of Apple Inc.'s Board of Directors. She was elected to the board in 2014 and currently serves as an Independent Director and Chair of the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee. Her background as a co-founder of BlackRock is also accurate.
